text.div:
CELIDARecommendations

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://www.ceosys.de/fhir/ImplementationGuide/celida-recommendations

resource.name: Abdominal positioning plan in case of ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg,
resource.description: In ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg, abdominal positioning should be consistently performed, with an abdominal positioning interval of at least 16 hours.

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux in hospitalised COVID-19 patients

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with LWMH
resource.description: Hospitalized patients with COVID-19 should receive standard drug thromboembolism prophylaxis with low molecular weight heparin in the absence of contraindications. Alternatively, fondaparinux may be used.

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (when contraindications for LWMH exist)

resource.name: No antithrombotic prophylaxis in patients with thrombosis
resource.description: No antithrombotic prophylaxis in patients with thrombosis

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (when contraindications for LWMH exist)

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with with Certoparin
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Certoparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Dalteparin
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Dalteparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Enoxaparin
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Enoxaparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Nadroparin High Weight in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

resource.name: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Nadroparin Low Weight
resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Nadroparin Low Weight in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

resource.name: Anticoagulation Plan for hospitalized intensive-care COVID-19 patients with no specific indication
resource.description: In intensive care patients without a specific indication (e.g. pulmonary embolism), therapeutic anticoagulation should not be given.

resource.name: No Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Argatroban
resource.description: No Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Argatroban for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with no specific indications (i.e., pulmonary embolism)

resource.name: No Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Certoparin
resource.description: No Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Certoparin for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with no specific indications (i.e., pulmonary embolism)

resource.description: No Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with UFH for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with no specific indications (i.e., pulmonary embolism)

resource.name: Population: Hospitalised COVID-19 Patients with (venous) thrombosis
resource.description: Population for recommendation 15: Hospitalised COVID-19 Patients with (venous) thrombosis

resource.name: Population: Hospitalised COVID-19 patients without (venous) thrombosis, existing contraindications to LWMH
resource.description: Population for recommendation 15: Hospitalised COVID-19 patients without (venous) thrombosis, existing contraindications to LWMH

resource.name: Population: Hospitalised COVID-19 patients without (venous) thrombosis and without contraindications to LWMH
resource.description: Population for recommendation 15: Hospitalised COVID-19 patients without (venous) thrombosis and without contraindications to LWMH

resource.name: Hospitalised COVID-19 patients, treated on ICU, without thrombembolic complication
resource.description: Hospitalised COVID-19 patients, treated on ICU, without thrombembolic complication

resource.name: Population: Rec17EK, Hospitalised COVID-19 patients without the need for intensive care therapy, without venous thrombosis, considered high-risk for developing venous thrombosis
resource.description: Population for recommendation 17 from guideline from https://www.awmf.org/leitlinien/detail/ll/113-001LG.html with characteristics: without the need for intensive care therapy, without venous thrombosis, considered high-risk for developing venous thrombosis

resource.name: Population: Ventilated COVID-19 Patients with severe ARDS
resource.description: Ventilated COVID-19 patients with severe ARDS, defined by oxygenation failure (Horovitz Quotient lower than 150)

resource.description: Ventilated COVID-19 patients with ARDS

resource.name: Abdominal Positioning
resource.description: In ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg, abdominal positioning should be consistently performed, with an abdominal positioning interval of at least 16 hours.

resource.description: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Certoparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Fondaparinux
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Fondaparinux for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with no specific indications (i.e., pulmonary embolism)

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Certoparin
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment (NMH) for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with high risk (D-Dimer >= 2mg/l) with Certoparin

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Dalteparin
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment (NMH) for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with high risk (D-Dimer >= 2mg/l) with Dalteparin

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Enoxaparin
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment (NMH) for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with high risk (D-Dimer >= 2mg/l) with Enoxaparin

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Nadroparin High Weight
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment (NMH) for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients (high weight) with high risk (D-Dimer >= 2mg/l) with Nadroparin

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Nadroparin Low Weight
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment (NMH) for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients (low weight) with high risk (D-Dimer >= 2mg/l) with Nadroparin

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Plan (hospitalised, non-intensive care, COVID-19 patients with no renal function impairment (eGFR >= 30ml/min))
resource.description: In hospitalized, non-intensive care patients with COVID-19 and increased risk (e.g., D-dimers ≥ 2 mg/l), therapeutic anticoagulation can be considered if the risk of bleeding is low. Anticoagulation, preferentially with NMH or UFH, can be considered.

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment UFH
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment (UFH) for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with high risk (D-Dimer >= 2mg/l)

resource.name: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Argatroban
resource.description: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Treatment with Argatroban for non-intensive care hospitalised COVID-19 patients patients with no specific indications (i.e., pulmonary embolism)

resource.name: Ventilation Plan for COVID-19 patients with ARDS
resource.description: In ventilated patients with COVID-19 and ARDS, tidal volume should be ≤ 6 ml/kg standard body weight, end-inspiratory airway pressure ≤ 30 cm H2O.
